main.name: K Vijay Kumar
main.description: Aspired to be a performance-driven web Developer and motivated to meet all web-based needs. Capable of independent and multitasking with Reactjs proficiency with ideal environment
main.quote: Work harder than you think you did yesterday
main.bio: As an aspiring web application developer, I took freeCodecamp as a platform to start my learning journey and progressed by creating some interesting applications. To strengthen my knowledge, I joined the React course in Internshala and continue to keep my good work up and active. Always preferred to work with challenges and upgrade my skill set.
